```{r}
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
ui <- fluidPage(
  
  #create a layout
  sidebarLayout(
    #sidebar
  sidebarPanel(
    #user select input of origin
  selectInput(inputId = "catergory",
              label = "Select your interested catergory: ",
              choices = unique(colnames(df1)),
              selected = NULL),
  
  #user select input of destination
  selectInput(inputId = "question",
              label = "Select your instered question: ",
              choices = unique(),
              selected = NULL)),
  
  #main
  mainPanel(
    tabsetPanel(
      tabPanel("Distribution", plotOutput("selected_graph")),
    #position of sidebar
    position = c("left"),
    #fixed
    fluid = FALSE))))

server <- function(input, output) {
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
